name: mrmrs/links

content.heading: links
content.subhead: Better default styles for text links

content.text:
LINKS

Better default link styles for your css. Because HAVE YOU SEEN THE BLUE AND RED they chose? Garish at best.

I trust you have time to read 8 lines of code.

Dev setup

If you want to modify sass/links.scss at all you can use the provided gulp tasks. To do that:

cd links && npm install . && gulp

Author

MRMRS
